overview: Lumen is a 2D animation that combines digital paint with collage. It is about a defective light bulb being an outcast in the factory. It fails to be fixed so it is discarded into the woods. Other perfect light bulbs are doing their jobs in keeping the city bright, while the "abnormal" and "imperfect" light bulb finds a unique way to shine and its purpose in life.
title: Lumen
